verbs.description: < p > [ARGM-TMP: Anytime] [ARG0: some Republican apologist] [ARGM-ADV: even] [V: mentions] [ARG1: a Dem or liberal is lying] I am going to tell them to “ SHUT THE TRUMP UP!”</p > < p class="is - empty - p"></p >
